Text: thank you. should be a great ul even if is just "readable".

well, it's a little bit more than 'just' readable. By readable I mean= you will not get annoyed by too many errors in text while reading. Anyway, I guarantee it's the best Gardner collection out there at this time.

BTW unnim2 

the above is not a criticism of what you wrote. Thanks for your comment!

Oh, no!  All of these  ESGardner novels but not a one he wrote as AAFair!!  The Lam and Cool novels were so much richer than the Masons; humor, detecting by the hero, ... just richer!  Please get them and UL them!

Please!  Please!  Please!

OMG, YES! U R RIGHT, Eleaticus. Donald Lam & Bertha Cool [& Elsa Brand?] were so much more fun than Perry & staff.

I'd echo Bertha if we'd get a bunch of them here:

"Fry me for an oyster!"


So, yes: Please!
